backFields.label: WHERE
backFields.value: WorkshopX, 6 Hamilton Avenue North, Ottawa, K1Y 4R1

backFields.label: Persuasive Technology
backFields.value: The main thing about Persuasive Technology is how to persuade people toward a task or behavior via software and computing devices. In other words it discusses the psychological factors to be considered for designing a persuasive application. It has some overlap with other technologies like gamification and communication science.

backFields.label: Sherlocked!
backFields.value: On August 25th, two of Philippe's paid apps were almost instantly obsoleted. Listen to the tales of woes as he had to rewrite his app in a few hours, and learn about App Transport Security.

backFields.label: Open discussion
backFields.value: Come and meet your fellow developers of all stripes in a friendly and inclusive atmosphere.

backFields.label: SUGGEST YOUR PICTURE
backFields.value: Email the organizer with your picture and license. Dimensions are exactly 360 x 440. Picture will be blurred automatically by Passbook.
